short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Knew Tab Extension replaces your new tab page with a personalized one, enhancing your browsing experience and allowing you to learn!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Knew Tab is an innovative extension that makes learning fun and rewarding. With every new tab you open, you'll be presented with engaging and informative QUICK general knowledge questions.

Key Features:

Introducing Knewbies: Enhance your trivia experience with Knewbiesâ€”unique pieces of knowledge / mnemonics / association-learning shared by users like you! Knewbies allow you to dive deeper into trivia by learning memorable ideas, stories, and tidbits provided by the community. You can even contribute your own Knewbie for others to enjoy and learn from.

Learning Made Fun: Say goodbye to boring idle tabs. With Knew Tab, you'll transform your browsing experience into an educational adventure. Discover interesting facts, explore new topics, and improve your general knowledge effortlessly.

Interactive Experience: Answer the trivia questions directly on your new tab page. The app provides a user-friendly interface that allows you to submit your answers with ease and convenience. And, we aren't taking away from your search needs.

Soon: Community quizzes. 
If you have a topic you want to learn and have others help you with Knewbies, then, wait for this feature to be released! You'll be able to add courses of your choice.

**We don't track any search queries**

Make every new tab count with Knew Tab. Expand your knowledge, have fun, and get rewarded for your learning journey. Start your trivia adventure now and see how far your knowledge can take you!
